name: ANCIENT RUS VS LIZARDS
description:
Lizard hordes attacked the great cities of the ancient Slavs again. You need to liberate the cities of Baikalsk and Hyperborea, in the role of one of the great heroes of the ancient Slavs.

Battlefields

  • The glorious ancient city of Baikalsk
  • The great capital of the ancient Slavs – Hyperborea
  • Dark Dungeons – The secret refuge of the ancient Slavs

Gameplay

At the moment, there are 4 heroes with different weapons and 3 levels available in the game. In the menu you can choose any hero and any level, all of them are available initially. To complete the level, you just need to defeat all the lizards. Bonfires will help you do this, after resting at which you can save your progress, as well as healing “Baikal water” that will restore vitality if they are running out.

Features Of the Game

  • Four unique heroes of ancient Slavs!
  • Three levels to choose from
  • Souls Like combat system
  • Realistic 3D Graphics
  • Healing Baikal water!
